Functions
fza_fnc_mpdGetCurrentDisplay
Description

Gets the displays that are being displayed on the MPDs

Parameters
_heli

the apache to show the correct values for.

Returns

[_leftMpd, _rightMpd] The two MPDs that are being displayed.

Examples
_ret = [_heli, 0] call fza_fnc_mpdGetCurrentDisplay;
// _ret => "fuel"
_ret = [_heli, 1] call fza_fnc_mpdGetCurrentDisplay;
// _ret => "eng"

Author: mattysmith22
